CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, Febuary 3, 1962, page 11A, reads: "Life Membership - Mrs. Daisy E. Lampkin (right) presents a plaque which denotes that the members of the ultra-smart So Re Lit Club has purchased a $500 life membership in the NAACP. Mrs. Jane Gantt Davis, president of the organization, accepts the plaque, as Mrs. Charlotte Eckstein (center) looks on. Mrs. Eckstein was chairman of the event, and Mrs. C. L. Mellon was co-chairman. - Harris Photos"
TitMainTitle: Jane Gantt Davis, Charlotte Eckstein, and Daisy E. Lampkin holding plaque and gathered around wooden podium in interior with piano and ferns
